titles.title: A bill for the relief of Stanley C. Bourassa and Katherine V. Bourassa.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 1/28/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to two named individuals in full settlement of all claims against the United States arising from the submersion of land allotted to one of those individuals.
